description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-37975), apply the relevant updates for your Windows operating system version:

1. Download and apply the KB5040442 update for Windows 11 Version 23H2 and 22H2 from the Microsoft Update Catalog at: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442.

2. For Windows 11 Version 21H2, download KB5040431 from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431.

3. For Windows 10 versions, apply KB5040448 or KB5040427 based on your system configuration, available here: [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448) and [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427).

**Details**:
This update addresses vulnerabilities that could allow an attacker to bypass secure boot features. Ensure that your system is running the supported build as outlined, and follow best practices by backing up your data before proceeding with the installation.

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm you have administrative privileges to apply these updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
